plot: Tells the story of the Confederacy's last great invasion of the north, in July 1864, and the subsequent attack on Washington, D.C. that almost brought the northern war effort to its knees. ...
title: No Retreat from Destiny: The Battle That Rescued Washington
plot_es: Tells the story of the Confederacy's last great invasion of the north, in July 1864, and the subsequent attack on Washington, D.C. that almost brought the northern war effort to its knees. ...
original_name: No Retreat from Destiny: The Battle That Rescued Washington
